section:
Référence de la classe CommonDBRelation CommonDBRelation
Common DataBase Relation Table Manager Class.
Est dérivée de CommonDBConnexity.
Dérivée par Appliance_Item, Appliance_Item_Relation, Calendar_Holiday, Cartridge, CartridgeItem_PrinterModel, Certificate_Item, Change_Problem, Change_Ticket, CommonITILActor, CommonItilObject_Item, Computer_Item, Contact_Supplier, Contract_Item, Contract_Supplier, Document_Item, Domain_Item, Entity_KnowbaseItem, Entity_RSSFeed, Entity_Reminder, Group_KnowbaseItem, Group_RSSFeed, Group_Reminder, Group_User, IPAddress_IPNetwork, IPNetwork_Vlan, ImpactRelation, Item_Cluster, Item_DeviceCamera_ImageFormat, Item_DeviceCamera_ImageResolution, Item_Devices, Item_Enclosure, Item_Kanban, Item_OperatingSystem, Item_Project, Item_Rack, Item_SoftwareLicense, Item_SoftwareVersion, Itil_Project, KnowbaseItem_Item, KnowbaseItem_KnowbaseItemCategory, KnowbaseItem_Profile, KnowbaseItem_User, NetworkPort_NetworkPort, NetworkPort_Vlan, Notification_NotificationTemplate, PDU_Rack, Pdu_Plug, PendingReason_Item, Problem_Ticket, Profile_RSSFeed, Profile_Reminder, Profile_User, ProjectTaskLink, ProjectTaskTeam, ProjectTask_Ticket, ProjectTeam, RSSFeed_User, Reminder_User, SavedSearch_User, Ticket_Contract, et Ticket_Ticket. getHistoryNameForItem1() getHistoryNameForItem1CommonDBRelation CommonDBRelationgetHistoryNameForItem1
getHistoryNameForItem1 (CommonDBTM $item, $case)
Get the history name of first item
Depuis
0.84
Paramètres
CommonDBTM$item
CommonDBTM object the other item (ie. : $item2)
string$case
: can be overwrite by object
'add' when this CommonDBRelation is added (to and item)
'update item previous' transfert : this is removed from the old item
'update item next' transfert : this is added to the new item
'delete' when this CommonDBRelation is remove (from an item)
Renvoie
string The name of the entry for the database (ie. : correctly slashed)

getRelationInputForProcessingOfMassiveActions() getRelationInputForProcessingOfMassiveActionsCommonDBRelation CommonDBRelationgetRelationInputForProcessingOfMassiveActions
static getRelationInputForProcessingOfMassiveActions ( $action, CommonDBTM $item, array $ids, array $input)[static]
Depuis
0.85
Set based array for static::add or static::update in case of massive actions are doing something.
Paramètres
string$action
the name of the action
CommonDBTM$item
the item on which apply the massive action
integer[]$ids
ids of the item on which apply the action
array$input
input provided by the form ($_POST, $_GET ...)
Renvoie
array containing the elements
Réimplémentée dans Group_User, NetworkPort_Vlan, et Profile_User.

Réimplémentée dans Document_Item.
getRelationMassiveActionsSpecificities() getRelationMassiveActionsSpecificitiesCommonDBRelation CommonDBRelationgetRelationMassiveActionsSpecificities
static getRelationMassiveActionsSpecificities ( )[static]
Get all specificities of the current itemtype concerning the massive actions
Depuis
0.85
Renvoie
array of the specificities: 'select_items_options_1' Base options for item_1 select 'select_items_options_2' Base options for item_2 select 'can_remove_all_at_once' Is it possible to remove all links at once ? 'only_remove_all_at_once' Do we only allow to remove all links at once ? (implies 'can_remove_all_at_once') 'itemtypes' array of kind of items in case of itemtype as one item 'button_labels' array of the labels of the button indexed by the action name 'normalized' array('add', 'remove') of arrays containing each action 'check_both_items_if_same_type' to check if the link already exists, also care of both items are of the same type, then switch them 'can_link_several_times' Is it possible to link items several times ? 'update_id_different' Do we update the link if it already exists (not used in case of 'can_link_several_times')
Réimplémentée dans Document_Item, Group_User, NetworkPort_Vlan, et Profile_User. Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
